compliant.section: 當您向我們購買虹光產品(如：在AVISION官網購買虹光產品)、部分付費服務時，您可能需要提供您的姓名、郵寄地址(包含郵遞區號)、電話號碼、電子郵件地址、信用卡號碼或其他付款資訊。另外，當您像我們尋求客戶支援服務(如：產品維修)時，除了前述資料，我們可能須請您額外提供您的產品的識別資料(如：產品序號)。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract.

compliant.section: 當您使用虹光產品時，我們可能會蒐集與您的產品相關連的產品識別資料，例如您的產品序號、網際網路協定位址(IP Address)等。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party...

compliant.section: 當您透過各種方式聯繫虹光，例如撥打電話至虹光(如：虹光客戶服務專線)、使用虹光線上真人客服服務、至虹光官方網站填寫聯絡表單、寄送電子郵件至虹光時，我們將可能把我們與您的通話內容進行錄音，或留存我們與您的對話紀錄或往返的電子郵件。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party...,  personal data shall be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes; further processing for archiving purposes in the public interest, scientific or historical research purposes or statistical purposes shall, in accordance with Article 89(1), not be considered to be incompatible with the initial purposes ("purpose limitation").

non_compliant.section: 此外，當您使用虹光產品及服務時，我們亦可能會蒐集無法辨識您個人身份的以下匿名資料。當您使用虹光產品及服務時，您不一定要依照我們的要求提供個人資料，但如果您選擇不提供，會導致我們在許多情況下無法為您提供產品或服務，或是無法回應您提出的問題。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Where personal data relating to a data subject are collected from the data subject, the controller shall, at the time when personal data are obtained, provide the data subject with all of the following information: ...  the existence of the right to withdraw consent at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal; ...  Where personal data are processed for direct marketing purposes, the data subject shall have the right to object at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her for such marketing, which includes profiling to the extent that it is related to such direct marketing.  ...  Personal data shall be: ...  collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes; further processing for archiving purposes in the public interest, scientific or historical research purposes or statistical purposes shall, in accordance with Article 89(1), not be considered to be incompatible with the initial purposes ("purpose limitation");
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes for data collection and processing, and that individuals have the right to refuse providing data, and the consequences of not providing such data. It should also specify the legal basis for processing data for each purpose, especially when processing sensitive data or using data for marketing.

non_compliant.section: 此外，若您親臨虹光的維修據點或辦公大樓，我們將可能透過監視錄影機對您的影像進行錄影。前述的錄音、錄影、對話紀錄，其內容可能包含您的個人資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be: ... adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are processed ("data minimisation");  Lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy needs to specify the legal basis for video recording, such as legitimate interest. It should also state the purpose of the recording, how long the recordings are kept, and the rights individuals have in relation to the recordings. For instance, if the purpose is security, it should be clarified that the recordings are not used for other purposes, such as employee monitoring. Additionally, the policy should mention that individuals have the right to access their personal data, including the recordings.
